propList.Name: delay
propList.Description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state (prevent flush)

propList.Name: indicator
propList.Description: React node of the spinning indicator

propList.Name: size
propList.Description: The size of Spin, options: small, default and large

propList.Name: tip
propList.Description: Customize description content when Spin has children

propList.Name: wrapperClassName
propList.Description: The className of wrapper when Spin has children
